title: "Why CIOs Are So Obsessed With The Cloud"
excerpt: "Benefits such as increased efficiency, flexibility, scalability and security make the cloud an attractive proposition for CIOs. Evolutions in cloud technology (like edge computing and more sustainable \"green\" cloud) are only likely to further its appeal."
